subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: I’ll Have Another and Bodemeister are the Preakness favorites, but neither appears to be head and shoulders above Went the Day Well and Creative Cause, two other Derby horses who endured tough races.
snippet: I’ll Have Another and Bodemeister are the Preakness favorites, but neither appears to be head and shoulders above Went the Day Well and Creative Cause, two other Derby horses who endured tough races.
